channel.title: making on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in making on Barefoot Rob

item.title: beads for sale
item.description: 19:30 Friday 18 August 2017 JST This is the first time I have worked with glass. Basically melted the end of a glass rod and tacked some colors onto it after the sensei wrapped it onto some sort of ceramic to which the glass apparently won’t adhere. Lin took pictures during the process and then when I finished was like お疲れ様です。 and I was like まだまだ and asked the sensei if I could make another.
